remarks: Function returning all the full functors from a category ` C ` to a category ` D ` .  A full functor is a functor in which all the morphism maps ` G ( X , Y ) ` between objects ` X , Y e. C ` are surjections. Definition 3.27(3) in [Adamek] p. 34.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jan-2017.)
statement:
df-full $p |- Full = ( c e. Cat , d e. Cat |-> { <. f , g >. | ( f ( c Func d ) g /\ A. x e. ( Base ` c ) A. y e. ( Base ` c ) ran ( x g y ) = ( ( f ` x ) ( Hom ` d ) ( f ` y ) ) ) } ) $.
$d c d f g x y $.
